name: PERSPECTIVE
description:
there are several issues, problems and conflicts that we need to manage in our daily life. If you take a close look at the situation and try to see the other person’s perspective you might have a better understanding of why they behave like that and can search for a common ground where you could agree to solve the issue. remember that people have different perspectives and see the world in different ways.

Created by bbaytra 2021.
